about.server: High availability Kubernetes cluster on bare metal managed and hosted in Switzerland ð¨ð­. The kubernetes cluster consists of one Dell PowerEdge R430 and two PowerEdge R630, in total this cluster has 448Gb of RAM (192Gb + 128Gb + 128Gb) and 128 cores (56 + 24 + 48). This cluster is connected to a UPS to avoid service interruption in case of power failure. This cluster is configured in high availability to be able to perform maintenance on this cluster without downtime.
